Summary: Large black triangle, blocked out stars.
divs: Sighting Detailsit stoped over my head i could not see any stars in the shape of a triangle it was so close i could throw a rock at it and not a sound came from it then it was gone i think but i did not even remeber that much for maby 2 years or so later when i was watching a ufo show on tv and they showed a black triangle pic then it came back to me what had took place back then it was so strange thet i must have had my memory cleared or somthing and by seeing it on tv it trigered my memory
